subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: It is only merciful to give The Times’s Knicks beat writer, Scott Cacciola, a break from such a woeful team. But where should he be sent to write about good hoops?
snippet: It is only merciful to give The Times’s Knicks beat writer, Scott Cacciola, a break from such a woeful team. But where should he be sent to write about good hoops?
